content.prompt: Which of the following best explains a result of the Seven Yearsâ€™ War (French and Indian War) ?

choices.label: France sold the Louisiana Territory to Great Britain.
Great Britain gained a claim to land extending to the Mississippi River.
Great Britain and Spain established an alliance.
British influence over its North American colonies decreased.

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
